backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no state or backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files across timers, backgrounds, and UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: App HTML shell loading Google Fonts and mounting the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with tabbed navigation, timer views, background/music layers, settings sheet, reminders, and alert integration.
frontend/src/branding.ts: Exports the appâ€™s display name constant.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: UI card allowing users to toggle timer completion alerts.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: Context provider storing alert settings and triggering toast and beep notifications on timer completion.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: Interface for selecting image/video/YouTube backgrounds with brightness and volume controls, validation, and error handling.
Provides background context using useBackground and manages cleanup of blob URLs.
Renders image, video, or YouTube backgrounds with brightness control and error handling.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame API once and exposes YTPlayer type definitions.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Utility functions for detecting media types, validating URLs, probing loadability, and generating error messages.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Manages background state, persistence, validation, and helpers for setting image, video, or YouTube backgrounds.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Creates a YouTube iframe player that auto-sizes to cover the viewport and reports playback errors.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs and builds background-optimized embed URLs.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: Provides music playback context using useMusic for source selection, volume, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI for setting music URL, clearing playback, and adjusting volume using context state.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders hidden audio or embedded Spotify/Apple players and manages direct-audio playback lifecycle.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses URLs to classify Spotify, Apple Music, or direct-audio sources and provides error messaging.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Manages music state, persistence, URL parsing, audio ref, playback errors, and volume control.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Share sheet showing the current URL with copy/open actions and publishing instructions.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook detecting if the app is running inside an iframe preview.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: UI to list, add, edit, and delete reminders with dialogs and date formatting.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Stores reminders in localStorage and provides add, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: UI component for a countdown timer with start, pause, reset, and duration editing controls using useCountdown.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Custom hook managing countdown logic, state persistence, and accurate ticking with completion callbacks.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: UI component for interval training timer showing rounds, interval progress, and controls, powered by useIntervalTimer.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Custom hook implementing alternating interval timing with persistence, skipping, rounds, and completion handling.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: UI component for Pomodoro workflow with segment display, controls, and adjustable durations using usePomodoro.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro segments, durations, state persistence, and automatic transitions with callbacks.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: UI component for a repeating countdown timer with controls, duration inputs, repeat settings, and infinite mode.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: React hook managing repeating timer logic, persistence, intervals, and completion handling.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Numeric text input component that validates, clamps, and syncs values on blur.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Rotary dial UI control allowing value adjustment via circular dragging with rotation tracking.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions formatting seconds or milliseconds into readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Hook providing an interval that reliably calls a callback while running.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: UI component for a stopwatch with start, pause, reset, and lap recording features.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: React hook implementing stopwatch timing, laps, and interval-driven updates.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Visibility toggle bar UI for showing or hiding timer components.
Hook managing persistent timer visibility state with auto-hide behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing backend actors tied to identity changes with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables, themes, and utility classes including styling for timers, YouTube backgrounds, and a rotary dial UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins, mapping CSS variables to theme values.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, issues, and pending requests for the TickTask app including timers, styling, and reminders.
